channel.title: update on Shawn Renner
channel.description: Recent content in update on Shawn Renner

item.title: We're Live!
item.description: I just finished uploading v1.0.0 of the site, which features a landing page with links, a simple “about” page, a long form résumé, and this blog. Next on my list is to create a more traditional pdf résumé, and start a “projects” section to highlight some projects I have been working on.
